text: Lajos Somodi Jr. (born 10 November 1953) is a Hungarian fencer. He competed in the individual and team foil events at the 1976 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Hungarian male fencers Category:Olympic fencers of Hungary Category:Fencers at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Martial artists from Budapest
title: Lajos Somodi Jr.
